

## Virtual Environment

**venv** allow us to manage every project independently (Avoiding version conflicts).
    * conda
    * virtualenv

### 1. Installation
This should be run only the first time.

```{python}
# Tip: Everytime I have to use bash (% or !)
!pip install virtualenv
!echo "Virtual environment allow to work every project with independent packages versions"
```

### 2. Create a virtual environment

```{python}
# a "bashenv" environment has been created (WOS)
!python -m venv bashenv
#!virtualenv bashenv 
```

### 3. Activate venv

```{python}

## Mac
#source env_name/bin/activate
```
